content: Tell of a story where Batman discusses "In a Grove" to Joker who is imprisoned in Arkham Asylum. The name of the dead victim, the samurai, is Takehiro, not Tajomaru. Batman tells the testimonies of the woodcutter, the priest, Tajomaru, Masago, and Takehiro's ghost (through a medium) and discusses each of them with Joker. End with Batman's conclusion of what actually happened and Joker's conclusion of what actually happened and whether they agree or not.
